snippet: Her series, "Life With La Toya," was announced along with two other series for 2013, as OWN hopes to generate some noise in its third year on cable television.
abstract: Her series, "Life With La Toya," was announced along with two other series for 2013, as OWN hopes to generate some noise in its third year on cable television.

headline.main: Oprah Winfrey's Network Signs La Toya Jackson
headline.print_headline: Oprah Winfrey Network Signs La Toya Jackson
